Zergling 


Zergliing slowly step towards Serpentor. He suddenly jumped up and 
swung his sword at Serpentor 2 times. He fired 3 optic blast at 
Serpentors neck. "Fellow Soilder Nemesis, Who should I attack, who is 
the enemy?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
BH/Blastrage


BH fires a Rocket at Hades. He fires and optic blast at an auto gun 
making it explod. 

Blastrage fires his flamethrower at the ground burning everything in 
sight.
